record.description: There is a lot of neighborliness, such as visiting in each other's houses, at the clothes lines, and over the fence that holds the garbage pails, as Mrs. Ahrens and Mrs. Candace Benton, were found doing. Mrs. Benton's husband is an anthropology student. The couple has a 2-year-old son, Lee.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: PR stamp. Public Relations stamp. Caption attached.
